townOverview: A tranquil, water-centric city known for its coral reefs and bustling docks.

townHighlights.description: A long wooden walkway along the shore, offering a beautiful view of the sunset.
townHighlights.investigationHint: Fresh footprints lead off the boardwalk towards a hidden cove.
townHighlights.investigationResult: You find a small shell that seems to glow in the moonlight.

townHighlights.description: A lively marketplace selling seafood and rare aquatic-themed trinkets.
townHighlights.investigationHint: Rumors of stolen pearls are circulating among traders.
townHighlights.investigationResult: One merchant admits they've seen suspicious visitors at dawn.

healingService.description: A small clinic run by local nurses specialized in Water-type ailments.

additionalFeatures.famousResident: Captain Marina, known for her oceanic exploration
additionalFeatures.localQuestGiver: Dockmaster Kaito who needs help tracking missing fishing nets
